I'm honoured to be awarded with the Legend DadaSaheb Phalke Award 2021 for Best Actor. Thank you for recognising my work & contribution to the Indian Cinema. I dedicate this award to my Mother, Brother, Family, Friends & Fans who have been my support and motivation my whole life.
